title: WordPress Navigation Target
description: An object that identifies a WordPress page and its capabilities.

purpose.description: The page's reason for being, in no more than 280 characters.

capabilities.description: An array of objects representing the page's capabilities.

capability_description.description: A description of what the capability does.

acting_element_selector.description: The CSS selector for the element that performs the capability.

element_type.description: The actual HTML element, (e.g., form, input, button, a), based on links and forms provided.

has_payload.description: Whether the element expects a payload or not. For example, an anchor tag or button does not expect a payload, but a form or input does.

payload_description.description: A description of what the element expects as a payload, only applicable when there is a form or input associated with it.

is_spa.description: Indicates whether the page is a single-page application (SPA) or not.
